DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether bazedoxifene acetate safe effective treatment osteoporosis postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Bazedoxifene Acetate In Osteoporosis In Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Must least 2 year postmenopausal Osteoporotic subject without vertebral fracture meet BMD criterion , Osteoporotic subject vertebral fracture Diseases may affect bone metabolism Vasomotor symptoms require treatment Known history suspect cancer breast Active past history venous thromboembolic event
